00062 inline void FeatureExtractorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00063 {
00064     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00065 
00066     if ( momentsComputingTime_.get() != 0 )

00070 inline void FeatureExtractorStatistics::momentsComputingTime (const double& elapsedTime)
00071 {

00073     updateTotalTime();
00074 }
